description: Send a trap about external semaphore alarm.
The ID of the external input alarm channel.
variables.name: H3C-PU-MAN-MIB::h3cPUExternalInputAlarmChannelID

description: Send a trap about video loss. Video loss is that no video
signal is inputted to the EC.

event.Summary: Video signal lost on EC input

description: The name of the video channel.
It is suggested that the name includes the channel ID
information.
variables.name: H3C-PU-MAN-MIB::h3cPUECVideoChannelName

description: Send a trap about video recovery after loss.

event.Summary: Video signal loss recovered on EC

description: The name of the video channel.
It is suggested that the name includes the channel ID
information.
variables.name: H3C-PU-MAN-MIB::h3cPUECVideoChannelName

description: Send a trap about motion detection.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-PU-MAN-MIB::h3cPUECManMotionDetectTrap H3C-PU-MAN-MIB::h3cPUECVideoChannelName s EXAMPLE H3C-PU-MAN-MIB::h3cPUECRegionCoordinateX1 u 9999 H3C-PU-MAN-MIB::h3cPUECRegionCoordinateY1 u 9999 H3C-PU-MAN-MIB::h3cPUECRegionCoordinateX2 u 9999 H3C-PU-MAN-MIB::h3cPUECRegionCoordinateY2 u 9999

description: The name of the video channel.
It is suggested that the name includes the channel ID
information.
variables.name: H3C-PU-MAN-MIB::h3cPUECVideoChannelName

description: The horizontal coordinate of top left point of the motion
detection region.
variables.name: H3C-PU-MAN-MIB::h3cPUECRegionCoordinateX1

description: The vertical coordinate of top left point of the motion
detection region.
variables.name: H3C-PU-MAN-MIB::h3cPUECRegionCoordinateY1

description: The horizontal coordinate of botton right point of the
motion detection region.
variables.name: H3C-PU-MAN-MIB::h3cPUECRegionCoordinateX2

description: The horizontal coordinate of botton right point of the
motion detection region.
variables.name: H3C-PU-MAN-MIB::h3cPUECRegionCoordinateY2

description: Send a trap when EC can not register the CMS.

event.Summary: EC failed to register with CMS

description: The IP address of the CMS.
All zero address indicates the CMS address is not configured.
variables.name: H3C-PU-MAN-MIB::h3cPUCMSAddr

description: Send a trap when the connection with the CMS breaks down.
The IP address of the CMS.
All zero address indicates the CMS address is not configured.
variables.name: H3C-PU-MAN-MIB::h3cPUCMSAddr

description: Send a trap when the connection with the version server breaks
down or can not create.

event.Summary: EC connection to version server lost

description: The IP address of the version server.
All zero address indicates the version server is not configured
or does not support remote upgrade.
variables.name: H3C-PU-MAN-MIB::h3cPUVersionServerAddr

description: Send a trap about flash failure.
Send a trap when a camera is sheltered.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-PU-MAN-MIB::h3cPUECManCameraShelterTrap H3C-PU-MAN-MIB::h3cPUECVideoChannelName s EXAMPLE H3C-PU-MAN-MIB::h3cPUECRegionCoordinateX1 u 9999 H3C-PU-MAN-MIB::h3cPUECRegionCoordinateY1 u 9999 H3C-PU-MAN-MIB::h3cPUECRegionCoordinateX2 u 9999 H3C-PU-MAN-MIB::h3cPUECRegionCoordinateY2 u 9999

description: The name of the video channel.
It is suggested that the name includes the channel ID
information.
variables.name: H3C-PU-MAN-MIB::h3cPUECVideoChannelName

description: The horizontal coordinate of top left point of the motion
detection region.
variables.name: H3C-PU-MAN-MIB::h3cPUECRegionCoordinateX1

description: The vertical coordinate of top left point of the motion
detection region.
variables.name: H3C-PU-MAN-MIB::h3cPUECRegionCoordinateY1

description: The horizontal coordinate of botton right point of the
motion detection region.
variables.name: H3C-PU-MAN-MIB::h3cPUECRegionCoordinateX2

description: The horizontal coordinate of botton right point of the
motion detection region.
variables.name: H3C-PU-MAN-MIB::h3cPUECRegionCoordinateY2
